title: ICE with recursive type using GAT.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(generic_associated_types)] use std::rc::Rc; use std::ops::Deref; trait PointerFamily { type Pointer: Deref + Sized; fn new(obj: T) -> Self::Pointer; } #[derive(Debug)] struct RcFamily; impl PointerFamily for RcFamily { type Pointer = Rc; fn new(obj: T) -> Rc { Rc::new(obj) } } #[derive(Debug)] enum Node where P::Pointer>: Sized { Cons(T, P::Pointer>), Nil } type List =

::Pointer>; type RcList = List; type RcNode = Node; impl Node where P::Pointer>: Sized { fn new() -> P::Pointer { P::new(Self::Nil) } fn cons(head: T, tail: P::Pointer) -> P::Pointer { P::new(Self::Cons(head, tail)) } } fn main() { let mut list: RcList = RcNode::::new(); list = RcNode::::cons(1, list); //println!("{:?}", list); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` note: rustc 1.56.0-nightly (a6ece5615 2021-08-03) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type bin ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground) warning: value assigned to `list` is never read --> src/main.rs:44:5 | 44 | list = RcNode::::cons(1, list); | ^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unused_assignments)]` on by default = help: maybe it is overwritten before being read? error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_codegen_llvm/src/context.rs:812:17: failed to get layout for `&rc::RcBox>`: the type `Node` has an unknown layout ```

Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1034:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: std::panic::panic_any 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 3: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: ::spanned_layout_of 8: core::ops::function::impls:: for &mut F>::call_mut 9: as core::iter::traits::iterator::Iterator>::fold 10: as alloc::vec::spec_from_iter::SpecFromIter>::from_iter 11: as rustc_middle::ty::layout::FnAbiExt>::new_internal 12: as rustc_middle::ty::layout::FnAbiExt>::of_instance 13: rustc_codegen_llvm::mono_item::::predefine_fn 14: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 15: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 16: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit 17: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate 18: ::codegen_crate 19: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 20: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 21: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 22: rustc_span::with_source_map 23: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 24: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
